metadata.feature_description: Create and edit rich HTML content using a WYSIWYG editor with inline editing capabilities

steps.action: Enable edit mode by clicking Edit icon in PersonaBar
steps.expected: Page enters edit mode with module editing controls visible
steps.actual: Page entered edit mode successfully with Actions links and 'Add Existing Module' options appearing

steps.action: Click on 'Click to add text' option in empty pane
steps.expected: New HTML module is created with inline editor
steps.actual: New HTML module was created and inline WYSIWYG editor toolbar appeared with formatting options

steps.action: Type content into the inline editor
steps.expected: Content is entered in the editor
steps.actual: Successfully entered heading 'Test Content Creation' and paragraph text using the inline editor

steps.action: Click outside the editor to save
steps.actual: Content was auto-saved when clicking outside the editor area

steps.action: Click on existing HTML module content to enable inline editing
steps.expected: Inline editor activates with WYSIWYG toolbar
steps.actual: Clicking on module activated inline editing mode with full WYSIWYG toolbar (Formatting, Bold, Italic, Underline, Lists, Link, HTML, Insert image, Advanced Editor)
Successfully modified content to '[EDITED VIA INLINE]'
Changes were auto-saved when clicking outside the editor

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Edit content in separate edit page

steps.action: Click Advanced Editor button from inline editing toolbar
steps.expected: Separate edit page/dialog opens with full CKEditor
steps.actual: Edit Content dialog opened with full CKEditor WYSIWYG interface including Source, Formatting, Lists, Alignment, Links, Images, Tables, Colors, Fonts, and Styles toolbars

steps.expected: Full rich text editing capabilities visible
steps.actual: CKEditor displayed with: Basic Text Box/Rich Text Editor toggle, Classic Editor link, comprehensive toolbar with Source, Preview, Print, Templates, Cut/Copy/Paste, Undo/Redo, Find/Replace, Lists, Indent, Alignment, Links, Images, Tables, Emoticons, Bold/Italic/Underline/Strikethrough, Styles/Format/Font/Size dropdowns, and Text/Background colors. Word count displayed.
Inline toolbar contains: Formatting (T), Bold (B), Italic (I), Underline (U), Ordered List, Unordered List, Outdent, Indent, Link, HTML view, Insert image, and Advanced Editor buttons

CKEditor provides comprehensive formatting: Document tools (Source, Preview, Print, Templates), Clipboard (Cut, Copy, Paste, Undo, Redo), Editing (Find, Replace, Select All), Paragraph (Lists, Indent, Quote, Alignment, Text direction), Links (Link, Unlink, Anchor), Insert (Image, Table, Horizontal Line, Smiley, Special Character, Page Break, IFrame), Basic Styles (Bold, Italic, Underline, Strikethrough, Subscript, Superscript, Remove Format), Styles (Styles, Format, Font, Size), Colors (Text Color, Background Color)

steps.action: Open edit dialog and close without clicking Save
steps.actual: Clicked Close button (X) on Edit Content dialog instead of 'Save and Close'. Dialog closed and returned to main page

steps.expected: Original content preserved or draft state maintained
steps.actual: Page showed published version when viewing mode, and draft version when re-entering edit mode. Auto-save preserved changes as draft.

steps.expected: Content is auto-saved when clicking outside
steps.actual: Auto-save functionality worked - content was saved automatically when clicking outside the editor area. This is confirmed by code review showing TIME_TO_AUTOSAVE = 5000ms (5 seconds) and saveContent() AJAX calls

steps.action: Verify content persisted after page interaction
steps.expected: Saved content appears in edit mode
steps.actual: Draft content '[EDITED VIA INLINE]' was preserved and visible when re-entering edit mode. Discard and Publish buttons available to manage draft state.

steps.action: Verify formatting controls in inline editor
steps.actual: Inline editor toolbar provides Bold (B), Italic (I), Underline (U) buttons, plus Ordered and Unordered list buttons, Indent/Outdent controls

steps.action: Verify style options in separate editor
steps.expected: Styles, Format, Font, Size dropdowns available
steps.actual: CKEditor provides Styles dropdown, Format dropdown (for paragraph/heading styles), Font dropdown, and Size dropdown

steps.action: Verify image insertion option in inline editor
steps.actual: Inline editor toolbar includes 'Insert image' button

steps.action: Verify image/media options in separate editor
steps.expected: Image, Table, and media insertion tools available
steps.actual: CKEditor provides Image button, Table button, Horizontal Line, Smiley, Special Character, Page Break, and IFrame insertion tools

observations: The inline editing uses a 'dnnInlineEditingMask' overlay div that intercepts pointer events - clicking on this mask activates the inline editor for the underlying module
Auto-save is implemented with a 5-second interval (TIME_TO_AUTOSAVE = 5000ms) that saves content automatically when changes are detected
The module supports both inline editing via the InlineEditing JavaScript class and a full separate edit page using CKEditor
Content changes are saved as drafts and require explicit Publish action to become visible to non-editors
The separate edit page (EditHtml.ascx) provides both 'Basic Text Box' and 'Rich Text Editor' modes
The Copilot AI assistant dialog frequently appeared during testing and needed to be dismissed multiple times
Code confirms beforeunload event handler auto-saves content when navigating away to prevent data loss
